definition: ... hence the name (used at the end of a sentence)

sentences.english: Confucian philosophy in Song dynasty treats rite as ultimate concern and so it's called Neo-Confucian religious philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 宋儒哲學以“理”爲終極關懷，故稱之新儒教哲學。

sentences.english: Cover a small pull with each pull of the, so called mother and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 蓋每拉有小拉附之，故稱母子椒。

sentences.english: After the appearance of the seemingly a peeled grape, it said, "uveal."
sentences.chinese: 外觀看似一去皮後之葡萄，故稱“葡萄膜”。

sentences.english: Later, people think it is thanks to the fairy in the sky, it said, "Tianma."
sentences.chinese: 後來，人們認爲這是天上仙女所賜，故稱“天麻”。
